```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library("mice")
library("lattice")
library("survival")
library("visdat")
library("ggplot2")
```

EDA

```{r }
# read the data
data <- read.csv("data.csv")

# check the structure of the data
str(data)
 
set.seed(123)


# check unique values
unique(data$Treatment_Group)
table(data$Subject_ID) 
length(unique(data$Subject_ID))

# check table with unique Subject_ID
unique_Subject_ID <- data[!duplicated(data$Subject_ID),]
# dim of unique_Subject_ID
dim(unique_Subject_ID)
table(unique_Subject_ID$Treatment_Group)
# distributions of MEM Comp stratified by Treatment and Day
xyplot(MEM_comp ~ day | Treatment_Group, data = data, type = c("p", "g"), layout = c(3, 1))

# facet grid (prob density)
ggplot(data, aes(x = MEM_comp|day, fill = Treatment_Group)) +
  geom_density(alpha = 0.5) +
  facet_grid(Treatment_Group  ~ .)
```
